src:
ITALIJANI OTKRIVAJU: Za vikend nas očekuje još jedna promena trenera u Seriji A!
05 Nov 2019, 09:49 by Kopi
Udineze će svog novog trenera imenovati nakon utakmice protiv SPAL-a ovog vikenda, prema pisanjima medija u Italiji.
Klub je prošlog vikenda otpustio Igora Tudora nakon poraza od Rome od 4:0, a pomoćnik Luka Gotu preuzeo je ekipu i ostvario pobedu od 3:1 protiv Đenove.
Međutim, Goti nema nameru da za stalno preuzme posao, prisiljavajući Udineze da na drugom mestu traži Tudorovog naslednika.
,,Sportitalia“ i ,,Tuttomercato“ pišu da će ‘Zebre’ zaposliti jednog od tri italijanska stratega – Valtera Zengu, Davidea Baljardinija i Morena Longa.
Intervjui su obavljeni u ponedeljak, a iako se predstavljanje novog trenera očekivalo u ponedeljak uveče, novi trener Udinezea očekuje se tek nakon nedeljne utakmice protiv SPAL-a.
Smatra se da Udineze želi dati novom treneru vreme da proceni svoje igrače i upozna ekipu, što reprezentativna pauza između 11. i 19. novembra čini idealnom prilikom.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
ITALIANS DISCOVER: Another change in Serie A coaches awaits us this weekend!
05 Nov 2019, 09:49 by Kopi
Udinese will name their new coach after a game against SPAL this weekend, according to Italian media reports.
Last weekend, the club fired Igor Tudor after a 4-0 defeat to Rome, with assistant Luka Gotu taking over the team and winning 3-1 against Genoa.
However, Gotti has no intention of permanently taking over the job, forcing Udinese to look for Tudor's successor elsewhere.
Sportitalia and Tuttomercato write that Zebre will hire one of three Italian strategists - Walter Zeng, David Ballardini and Moreno Long.
Interviews were conducted on Monday, and although the introduction of the new coach was expected on Monday night, the new Udinese coach is expected only after Sunday's game against SPAL.
Udinese is said to want to give the new coach time to evaluate his players and get to know the team, making the team break between November 11 and 19 an ideal opportunity.
